name: primatologist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who studies primates (= intelligent mammals including apes, monkeys, and humans): a lecture on chimps by famed primatologist Jane Goodall At one time he wanted to be a primatologist. See
primatology
More examplesFewer examplesHe's a primatologist and evolutionary biologist .She's a primatologist renowned for having taught bonobos to communicate with printed symbols.The students are working with a team of primatologists observing monkeys in the wild.
